title: Can't play tutorial?
body: I got up to the tutorial screen where it says you have to wait for the game to download before being able to play,and you can skip it,but since I'm new I wanted to play the tutorial.I waited a good 15 minutes but the play button still was unavailable.I can't tell if there's some issue or it takes a long time to completely download the game.

replies.body: As far as I know, you'll still need to finish that patch before you're able to play even the tutorial. If that patch is done and the Play Button is still greyed out, there may actually be something going on with your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Double check the steps in that network guide, and let me know if that gets you on the Rift!
